title: Firebomb thrown by ejected patron kills 11 at Mexico bar, officials say
description: The fire at the bar next to the Mexico-U.S. border was intentionally ignited by a drunken patron who had been kicked out for their behavior toward women there, prosecutors said.

title: Wildfires ravage Greek island of Rhodes, forcing 19,000 to flee
description: It comes as southern Europe is swelters under a July heat wave, with Greece, Italy and Spain recently issuing weather warnings for residents and tourists.

title: Israel’s judicial overhaul pits defense establishment against Netanyahu
description: Israelis continued to protest the government's plan to weaken the Supreme Court as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu went to hospital to have a pacemaker fitted.

title: Spain votes amid right-wing hopes of a conservative wave
description: Spain's election could mint the most right-wing government since 1975, polls suggest. The anti-LGBTQ+, climate-denying Vox party could be a kingmaker.

title: Matty Healy’s same-sex kiss in Malaysia roils some local LGBTQ activists
description: Some Malaysian activists fear the onstage kiss between the 1975’s frontman and bassist will spur backlash against the LBGTQ community ahead of state elections.

title: Ukraine live briefing: At least one killed, 19 injured after missiles rain down on Odessa
description: Russian missiles hit the port city before dawn on Sunday, Ukrainian officials said, destroying a historic cathedral and putting the country’s eastern half on alert.
